ThingShape.description: Thing Shape Interface for containing core component services. Every Component will need to implement this interface. This will contain services that will support Solution Configuration Pages etc.
ThingShape.name: PTC.Base.ComponentInterface_TS

PropertyDefinition.description: The deployment state of the building block. Can be either 'Not Configured', 'Configured', or 'Error' state.
PropertyDefinition.name: componentDeploymentState

PropertyDefinition.description: List of Components that are needed for this component to function
PropertyDefinition.name: dependentComponents

ServiceDefinition.description: Override-able service to handle any post install deployments/configurations.
ServiceDefinition.name: DeployComponent

ResultType.description: returns true or false depending on if deployment was successful.
ResultType.name: result

ServiceDefinition.description: Returns the Component Deploy Configuration Parameters property
ServiceDefinition.name: GetComponentDeployConfigurationParameters

ServiceDefinition.description: Returns the Component Description property
ServiceDefinition.name: GetComponentDescription

ServiceDefinition.description: This service returns the extension version and build number for the given component.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetComponentExtensionVersion

ServiceDefinition.description: Returns the Component Main Mashup property.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetComponentMainMashup

ServiceDefinition.description: Returns the Migrate Component Configuration Parameters property
ServiceDefinition.name: GetComponentMigrateConfigurationParameters

ServiceDefinition.description: Return the Component Name property
ServiceDefinition.name: GetComponentName

ServiceDefinition.description: Returns the Component Provided Elements property.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetComponentProvidedElements

ServiceDefinition.description: Returns the Component Required Elements property
ServiceDefinition.name: GetComponentRequiredElements

ServiceDefinition.description: Returns the Component Thumbnail
ServiceDefinition.name: GetComponentThumbnail

ServiceDefinition.description: Returns the Component Type property
ServiceDefinition.name: GetComponentType

ServiceDefinition.description: Returns the Upgrade Component Configuration Parameters property
ServiceDefinition.name: GetComponentUpgradeConfigurationParameters

ServiceDefinition.description: Returns component version property
ServiceDefinition.name: GetComponentVersion

ServiceDefinition.description: Returns the configured default component manager thing.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetConfiguredComponentManager

ServiceDefinition.description: Migrate component to the latest.
ServiceDefinition.name: MigrateComponent

ServiceDefinition.description: Runs validations and actions necessary before data related to a component (building block) is migrated.
ServiceDefinition.name: PreMigrateComponent

ServiceDefinition.description: Runs validations and actions necessary before a component (building block) is upgraded.
ServiceDefinition.name: PreUpgradeComponent

ServiceDefinition.description: Upgrade component to the latest.
ServiceDefinition.name: UpgradeComponent

ServiceDefinition.description: Validates the component deploy config parameters against the passed in JSON payload.
ServiceDefinition.name: ValidateComponentDeployConfigParams

FieldDefinition.description: passed in JSON params to compare against the components params.
FieldDefinition.name: jsonParams

ServiceDefinition.description: Validates the component migrate config parameters against the passed in JSON payload.
ServiceDefinition.name: ValidateComponentMigrateConfigParams

FieldDefinition.description: passed in JSON params to compare against the components params.
FieldDefinition.name: jsonParams

ServiceDefinition.description: Validates the component upgrade config parameters against the passed in JSON payload.
ServiceDefinition.name: ValidateComponentUpgradeConfigParams

FieldDefinition.description: passed in JSON params to compare against the components params.
FieldDefinition.name: jsonParams

Row.code: // Return true as a default var result = true;

ConfigurationTableDefinition.description: Configuration table to store the components core manager
ConfigurationTableDefinition.name: ComponentManager

ConfigurationTable.description: Configuration table to store the components core manager
ConfigurationTable.name: ComponentManager

FieldDefinition.description: unique identifier for the manager that needs to be configured
FieldDefinition.name: id

FieldDefinition.description: Name of the Manager Thing to be configured
FieldDefinition.name: managerThingName
